lyrics:
8 contributorssmother me lyricsverse 1
let me be the one who calls you baby all the time
surely you can take some comfort knowing that youre mine
just hold me tight lay by my side
and let me be the one who calls you baby all the time

prechorus
i found my place in the world
could stare at your face for the rest of my days

chorus
now i can breathe
turn my insides out and smother me
warm and alive im all over you
would you smother me

verse 2
let me be the one who never leaves you all alone
i hold my breath and lose the feeling that im on my own
leaves me all alone
hold me too tight stay by my side
and let me be the one who calls you baby all the time
all the time

prechorus
i found my place in the world
could stare at your face for the rest of my days
you might also likechorus
now i can breathe
turn my insides out and smother me
warm and alive im all over you
would you smother me
smother me smother me
smother me smother me

bridge
when im alone time goes so slow
i need you here with me
and how my mistakes have made your heart break
still need you here with me
so baby im baby im here

chorus
now i can breathe turn my insides out
and smother me smother me
warm and alive im all over you
would you smother me
now i can breathe turn my insides out
and smother me smother me
warm and alive im all over you
would you smother me
smother me smother me
smother me smother me
outro
let me be the one who calls you baby all the time
let me be the one who calls you baby all the time
let me be the one who calls you baby all the time
let me be the one who calls you baby
the one who calls you baby
